com.hazelcast.internal.util

Class ModularJavaUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.util.ModularJavaUtils

  • public final class ModularJavaUtils
extends Object
    Helper class for simplify work with Java module system (Java 9+) in older Java versions.
